mods.abstract: This is an interview with Jeff A Marmon Jr. He grew up in the Evergreen neighborhood and spent most of his life there. He saw the Evergreen neighborhood start to develop businesses within the community. Jeff also recalls some of the people who lived in the Evergreen neighborhood when he was younger.
